## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem or Use Case
What problem does this feature solve? Or what new gameplay experience does it enable?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you envision this feature working. Be as detailed as you like.

## Alternative Solutions
Are there alternative approaches that could achieve the same goal?

## Implementation Considerations (optional)
If you have thoughts on how this could be implemented technically:
- [ ] Would this affect game performance?
- [ ] Would this require new visual assets?
- [ ] Would this change existing gameplay mechanics?
- [ ] Would this add new UI elements?

## Examples
Are there similar features in other games that inspire this request? Please provide examples or references.

## Impact on Existing Features
Would this feature affect or conflict with existing gameplay mechanics?

## Priority
How important is this feature to you?
- [ ] Critical - Game is unplayable without it
- [ ] High - Would significantly improve the experience
- [ ] Medium - Nice to have
- [ ] Low - Just an idea

## Additional Context
Add any other context, mockups, or screenshots about the feature request here.
